channel.title: Something is wrong with my server.. 500k reward for help
channel.description:
somethining is wrong with my shop. i just got sibal clinet and i wanna use another shop and put some skill capes on it the shhop aregionly had 22 items so i deleted em all puttinign skill capes there but i compiler is good i ran the server the java.long thing is messed and it wont let no 1 logg on even me. how do i get the items on the store without makininnng my server messed this is wat it says now. shop = 8 Thessalia_Fine_Clothes 2 2 7622 99 7642 99 7643 99 7664 99 7650 99 7651 99 7644 99
500k rs cash reward

item.title: Something is wrong with my server.. 500k reward for help
item.dc:creator: @Aff Aff
item.description:
@Aff wrote:

You retards, it has nothing to do with the run.bat or anything else, it’s either a problem with his client.java, shop.cfg, item.cfg, or anything else he editted to make his shop.

Read full topic

item.title: Something is wrong with my server.. 500k reward for help
item.dc:creator: @mamoth mamoth
item.description:
@mamoth wrote:

I’ll tell you whats wrong your port is 0000? well try other ports or copy the run.bat of some1 other or make a file called voule.bat or something it helps alot. and if that oesnt work mabye theres a file system screw up just saying thats all ok.[br][size=1]Posted on: September 06, 2007, 03:35:24 PM[/size][hr]ooh you want to put stuff in thelisas fine clothes well then
return all files as they were before and theres a download link somewhere on mopar where it says shops if you replace it with that the shops will be filled with the new rs items!!

item.title: Something is wrong with my server.. 500k reward for help
item.dc:creator: @anelm anelm
item.description:
@anelm wrote:

i know how to fix it… when ur in shops. here is an example…

shop = 8	@whi@Herblore_Shop		1	1	227	2000	249	2000	251	2000	253	2000	255	2000	257	2000	259	2000	261	2000	263	2000	265	2000	267	2000	269	2000	221	2000	235	2000	225	2000	223	2000	1975	2000	239	2000	231	2000	2970	2000	241	2000	245	2000	247	2000	2483	2000	3138	2000

First of copy one of the above shops and pase it at the end right before [ENDOFSHOPLIST], next leave the first 2 numbers, and change the rest to what you want them to be, for example on the top change 227 to what ever id u want then change the 2000 to how many of them you want to have… Also if you run out of space you !cannot! press space twice and put in another code every time u want to add a new one you have to press tab or you will get errors…

Read full topic

@digzey wrote:

yes he is right… plus… did you add the npc id in the autospawn if you havent done that… then do it quickly… oh and can you take a picture of what your compiler says?
because i think it’s just a simple human error like a misclick or type… because it seems basic to add a shop…
or if ur source is too old… to add a shop with the items then… download new one… like my one i have got open now or somthing…
it’s gotta be one of them things…[br][size=1]Posted on: September 02, 2007, 03:54:32 PM[/size][hr]take that as u havent worked it out yet…
